Alien World.title: Alien World
Alien World.desc: Engage in a drawing activity! For example, draw an alien world. Unleash your creativity and showcase your artistic skills.

content.desc: Upload your drawing of the alien world
Did your child express enjoyment or challenges while drawing the alien world?
What was your child's favorite part of the drawing activity?

Chess Mania.title: Chess Mania
Chess Mania.desc: Engage in the game of chess.

content.desc: How familiar is your child with the rules of chess?
Did your child enjoy playing chess?
What strategies did your child use during the game?
Did your child express any challenges or victories they faced during the chess game?

Color Sort.title: Color Sort
Color Sort.desc: Present a set of colored objects to your child and encourage them to sort them by color. Once the sorting is complete, snap a photo of the sorted objects and upload it here.

content.desc: Upload a photo of the sorted objects by color
How much time did your child take to complete the color sorting activity?
Did your child enjoy the process of sorting the colored objects?
Did your child show any signs of irritation during or after the activity?

Craft a Geo.title: Craft a Geo
Craft a Geo.desc: Hand over some playdough to your child and challenge them to craft various geometric shapes. Encourage combining shapes to create more complex structures or objects.

content.desc: Upload an image of your child's playdough creations
How did your child approach crafting various geometric shapes with playdough?
Did your child combine shapes to create more complex structures or objects?
Rate your experience
Did your child express any challenges or joys while working with playdough?

Guess the Object.title: Guess the Object
Guess the Object.desc: Select household items that make distinct sounds, such as a clock, cereal box, metal lid (placed on a pan), and a potato chip bag. Put a blindfold on your child and have them try to guess which object made the sound.

content.desc: Describe your child's reaction to the 'Mystery Sound' activity.
How well did your child guess the objects based on their sounds?
Did your child express enjoyment or challenges while playing the 'Mystery Sound' game?
Were there any specific sounds or objects that particularly intrigued your child?

Labeling the Cups.title: Labeling the Cups
Labeling the Cups.desc: Task your child with labeling each cup with the corresponding written number. After completion, take note of how many they answered correctly.

content.desc: How many cups did your child correctly label with the corresponding written number?
What approach did your child use to label the cups with the correct numbers?
Did your child enjoy the process of labeling the cups?
Were there any challenges or joys your child expressed during this activity?

What's on the tray?.title: What's on the tray?
What's on the tray?.desc: Place 10 items on a tray and give your kids only 1 minute to observe. After removing the tray, ask them to write down as many items as they can remember.

content.desc: How did your child approach remembering the items on the tray?
Did your child miss writing a few or many items from the tray?
How did your child feel about the 'What's on the Tray?' Memory Challenge?

Narrate a Fairy Tale.title: Narrate a Fairy Tale
Narrate a Fairy Tale.desc: Get creative and narrate your favorite fairy tale with a twist! Create a new storyline or reimagine the ending. Express your imagination and storytelling skills. Once done, upload the audio file of your narrated fairy tale with a twist.

content.desc: Narrate a fairy tale with a twist
How did your child come up with the new storyline or ending?
Did your child enjoy the process of adding a twist to the fairy tale?

Create a Nature Collage.title: Create a Nature Collage
Create a Nature Collage.desc: Gather leaves, pebbles, and small sticks from the outdoors. Glue them onto a piece of cardboard or stiff paper. (You can repurpose cereal and cracker boxes for this purpose.

content.desc: Upload a photo of your nature collage
How much time did your child take to do this?
Rate your experience
